summary: A couple retreat to Venice to work on their relationship, but an encounter with a stranger leads them into a world of intrigue - where their darkest desires are in reach.
cast: Christopher Walken|Rupert Everett|Natasha Richardson|Helen Mirren|Manfredi Aliquo|David Ford|Daniel Franco|Rossana Canghiari|Fabrizio Sergenti Castellani|Mario Cotone|Giancarlo Previati|Antonio Serrano
